title: Setting Up the Proportion
text: The two main variables in this problem is weight of the dog to weight of the antibacterial medicine. Using the standard antibacterial medicine ratio as one proportion and Sunny's as the other one we can set up the resultinig proportion: $$\frac{65}{x}=\frac{1}{5}$$

title: Cross Multiply
text: Cross multiply by taking the numerator of the first expression and multiplying it with the denominator of the second experssion. Then cross multiply the remaining numbers.
